sections.title: How to Set and Use Servo Positions
sections.content: Servos are controlled by setting their position, usually a value between 0.0 and 1.0. Each value corresponds to a physical angle or position.

sections.title: Positioning Tips
sections.subtitle: Best practices for servo control
items: Use setPosition() to move to a specific point
Map positions to mechanism states (open, closed, etc.)
Avoid forcing servos beyond their limits

sections.title: Example: Claw Positions
sections.code:
claw.setPosition(0.0); // Closed
claw.setPosition(0.5); // Half open
claw.setPosition(1.0); // Fully open

sections.title: Documentation
sections.content: Document your servo positions in code for clarity and easier debugging.
